Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25312021]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5α(Not active up to 150 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2151(Not active up to 150 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25312021]0.1% Hemolysis against Rat erythrocytes at 20 µM.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: 1.8%,2.8%,3.9% α-helix were mearsured by CD spectra at 10 °C, 25 °C and 37 °C in 10 mm Tris-HCl (pH 7.2).
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria.
